questions.question: What is a neuron in the context of artificial neural networks?
choices: A biological cell in the brain
A computational unit that takes weighted inputs and produces an output
A layer in the neural network

questions.question: Which activation function is most commonly used in hidden layers of modern deep neural networks?
What does backpropagation do in a neural network?
choices: Propagates errors backward to update weights and biases
Prevents overfitting by dropping random neurons

questions.question: Which type of neural network is best suited for processing sequential data like text or time series?
What is the purpose of a learning rate in neural network training?
choices: To determine the accuracy of the model
To control the step size of weight updates during training
To specify the number of training epochs
To evaluate the model on test data
